Name: Celery Gimlet No.2
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE celery with salt in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Sweet 'n' sour, salt 'n' vinegar served with dry celery gin crunch – a cocktail to awaken your senses.
History: A riff on the classic Gimlet , this recipe is adapted from Naren Young's Celery Gimlet and inspired by salt and vinegar flavours.
